Package uk.co.terminological.rjava.types

Class RArray<X extends RPrimitive>

java.lang.Object
uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RArray<X>
Type Parameters:
X - the generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
RNumericArray
public abstract class RArray<X extends RPrimitive> extends Object implements RObject
The RArrays are actually vectors with the logical dimensions specified seperately, and they can be re-dimensioned on the fly.

    • rCode

      public String rCode()
      Description copied from interface: RObject
      Derives the R code representation of this object. This is used for some objects as a wire serialisation (RList and RNamedList) to copy them accross to R. Other data types tend to use the raw primitives to copy.
      Specified by:
      rCode in interface RObject
      Returns:
      a string that can be parsed as R code.
